Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Fva1 (Api-like PrAMPs, natural AMPs-like, Pro-rich, UCLL1, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (68%) toLL-25P: 35%, R: 20%. GRAVY: -1.45; Mol Wt: 2348.748; mol formula: C106H172N34O25;  mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against active against E. coli BL21 (MIC 0.125-0.25 uM) and K. pneumoniae AR-0112 (MIC 1-16 uM) in 33% TSB and RPMI/serum. Warning: non-standard assay. Other bacteria not tested.
